TechChange - online training for international development - Washington, DC

Full-time, open to remote

At TechChange we're building a training platform for humanitarian aid workers in low-bandwidth locations. We currently have 15 team members and are profitable and bootstrapped without venture funding.

We're looking for developers of all stripes, but are especially interested in those with experience in Node/Express/Backbone.

If you're interested, send an email to info@techchange.org with the subject Hacker News.
